Sequence Information.Source: DiaPep277 is a small, lyophilized powder containing 24 Amino-acids. It has proved in former studies that DiaPep277 can slow down beta cells destruction in the pancreas and therefore decelerate the progress of Diabetes.
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found on DRAMP database
Reference: Potential of immunomodulatory host defense peptides as novel anti-infectives.Trends in Biotechnology(2009).(PMID:19683819)
